brand.name: APNASTAY
brand.identity: Premium PG & Shared Living for Professionals

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#FF8C42] to-[#E91E63] text-white hover:opacity-90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#E91E63] border-2 border-[#E91E63]/20 hover:border-[#E91E63] hover:bg-[#E91E63]/5 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold
buttons.ghost: text-gray-600 hover:text-[#E91E63] hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium

cards.property: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-2xl transition-all duration-500 border border-gray-100
cards.feature: p-8 rounded-2xl bg-white border border-gray-100 hover:border-[#FF8C42]/30 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300
cards.dashboard: p-6 rounded-xl bg-white border border-gray-100 shadow-sm

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-gray-200 focus:border-[#E91E63] focus:ring-[#E91E63]/20 bg-gray-50/50

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' }}

3d_strategy.hero: Interactive floating 3D elements (keys, house abstract) using R3F
3d_strategy.scroll: Parallax effects on property images using Framer Motion

assets.logo_placeholder: Heart shape with gradient #FF8C42 to #E91E63 + Green Leaf #7CB342

instructions_to_main_agent: Use .js extension for all new files.
Implement 'Lenis' for smooth scrolling in the root App component.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Navbar and Footer globally.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts in index.css.
For the 'Explore PGs' page, use a sidebar filter layout with a sticky position.
Mock authentication using localStorage. Create a 'AuthContext' to manage 'user', 'admin', 'super_admin' roles.
Do not use real backend calls. Create a 'mockData.js' file to export arrays of PGs, users, and bookings.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Use the specified gradient for primary buttons and active states.
For the 3D element, create a simple 'Hero3D.js' component using @react-three/fiber that renders a rotating abstract shape or house model if available, or just a nice interactive particle field.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ğŸ¤–ğŸ§ ğŸ’­ğŸ’¡ğŸ”®ğŸ¯ğŸ“šğŸ­ğŸ¬ğŸªğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸğŸ€ğŸ‚ğŸ°ğŸˆğŸ¨ğŸ°ğŸ’°ğŸ’µğŸ’³ğŸ¦ğŸ’ğŸª™ğŸ’¸ğŸ¤‘ğŸ“ŠğŸ“ˆğŸ“‰ğŸ’¹ğŸ”¢ğŸ†ğŸ¥‡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
